marcher_pages_path_data_position_check.name: marcher_pages_path_data_position_check
marcher_pages_path_data_position_check.value: path_start_position >= 0 AND path_start_position <= 1 AND path_end_position >= 0 AND path_end_position <= 1

midsets_path_data_position_check.name: midsets_path_data_position_check
midsets_path_data_position_check.value: path_start_position >= 0 AND path_start_position <= 1 AND path_end_position >= 0 AND path_end_position <= 1

timing_objects.name: timing_objects
timing_objects.definition:
SELECT
        beats.position AS position,
        beats.duration AS duration,
        SUM(duration) OVER (
            ORDER BY position
            ROWS BETWEEN UNBOUNDED PRECEDING AND 1 PRECEDING
        ) AS timestamp,
        beats.id AS beat_id,
        pages.id AS page_id,
        measures.id AS measure_id
    FROM beats
    LEFT JOIN pages
        ON beats.id = pages.start_beat
    LEFT JOIN measures
        ON beats.id = measures.start_beat
    ORDER BY beats.position ASC
